description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, where you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Chicken Race" mini-game!
For a man, there are times when he must fight.
The reason? It's unnecessary.
Just, now. It's about determining who's stronger. That's all.
And the resolution? The moment you hit the brakes.
Now, buddy, let's settle this!
name: Additional mini-game "Chicken Race"
